name: Les Misérables: Cosette's Fate
description: Les Misérables' is one of the most famous literary works in the world. It has been adapted for film several times. It's now available as a video game for the first time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 1 GB available space
